name: Yare 2 Ultimate VR
description:
IMPORTANT 1: THIS IS A .EXE FILE that runs with WINDOWS only

IMPORTANT 2: This game was developed and tested on OCULUS QUEST 2 ONLY

Get a unique experience in a VR environment where you can have Yaretta dance right beside you. 

Yaretta now has a voice. 

There is a giantess mode available as well as the possibility to change the color of Yaretta's clothes.

Yaretta can now dance.

Thank you so much for all your support.
